name: Free Alarm Clock
short_description:
Free Alarm Clock is a useful software that claims to keep you ready and active for anything. It is developed with the two core features of Free Alarm Clock and Task Reminder in it which are totally free of cost. It provides you with the convenience of setting multiple alarms and reminders in it. This Alarm Clock software is marked with HD quality and amazing features. It allows you to add, delete or edit your alarms and tasks or reminders with just a simple click. More above it, the additional features of Alarm loops, Snoozing or adding up of your own music and files to your alarm make it stand apart from others. Alarm Clock is rated as a user friendly and good application software.

Reminder Software is a free to install software, but, for its future updates, it may require some funding. While installing this software, certain notifications regarding some software offers may pop up which you are allowed to accept or reject as per your convenience.
summary: Alarm Clock and Task Reminder are 2 core feature of this Software and
